version_description:
- New! Universal Inbox shows Private Messages from all forums
- "Following" tab is now replaced with a simplier, bigger Home tab that navigates to your favorite forums easily.
- Creating New PM / Topic is now much easier with the universal Compose button
- New Forum Admin / Moderator Badge to easily identify forum admin and moderators
- Ability to Mute and Unmute and forums or topics level so you have much better control the push alerts
- Plus tons of under-the-hood improvements and crashs

And a lot of under-the-hood performance improvement.

- New! Universal Inbox shows Private Messages from all forums
- "Following" tab is now replaced with a simplier, bigger Home tab that navigates to your favorite forums easily.
- Creating New PM / Topic is now much easier with the universal Compose button
- New Forum Admin / Moderator Badge to easily identify forum admin and moderators
- Ability to Mute and Unmute and forums or topics level so you have much better control the push alerts
- Plus tons of under-the-hood improvements and crashs

And a lot of under-the-hood performance improvement.

- VoiceOver fixes
- Other bug and crash fixes

- VoiceOver fixes
- Other bug and crash fixes

- Bug and crash fixes
- Solved some forums having Access Denied issues with CloudFlare enabled.

- Bug and crash fixes
- Solved some forums having Access Denied issues with CloudFlare enabled.

- Fix Subscription Tab not being updated.
- Fix log in issue.

- Fix Subscription Tab not being updated.
- Fix log in issue.

- Native Inline attachment (require forum plugin update)
- "Who's Online" is back!
- "Forum Compose" button to make it easier to send PM or started new topic in Forum Home screen
- Revised Push Notifications settings to make it easier to use and control
- Fixed Password not remembering issue
- Other bugs and performance improvement

- Native Inline attachment (require forum plugin update)
- "Who's Online" is back!
- "Forum Compose" button to make it easier to send PM or started new topic in Forum Home screen
- Revised Push Notifications settings to make it easier to use and control
- Fixed Password not remembering issue
- Other bugs and performance improvement

- Fixed a issue of not jumping to the latest message in a conversation
- Resolved a issue surrounding Chat messages not loading

- Fixed a issue of not jumping to the latest message in a conversation
- Resolved a issue surrounding Chat messages not loading

Thank you for your feedback! In this version we fixed an important Log In issue for forum running an older version of Tapatalk Plugin.

If you have run into issues with "don't have permission" or the login keep switching you to different account, this version should fix the issue. And if not, write to us at support@tapatalk.com so we can fix it for you.

Thank you!

Thank you for your feedback! In this version we fixed an important Log In issue for forum running an older version of Tapatalk Plugin.

If you have run into issues with "don't have permission" or the login keep switching you to different account, this version should fix the issue. And if not, write to us at support@tapatalk.com so we can fix it for you.

Thank you!
In this version we fixed one more issue with the Log In for forums running an older version of Tapatalk Plugin.
In this version we fixed one more issue with the Log In for forums running an older version of Tapatalk Plugin.

- Minor UI update on Blog and Thread view
- Better Feed control - Now you can completely turn off Trending while keeping New Discussions to appear in the Feed
- Ads quality is improved and less game install ads. (Subscribe to our VIP to remove ads! :)
- Now it's easier to switch forum account 
- Basic support for Panjo Marketplace
- New Push Alert settings to force all push alerts with alert tones (default is OFF)
- Forum Home page is updated with the new "Home" tab
- "Who's Online" is back!
- Now you can like a post in a chatroom!

- Minor UI update on Blog and Thread view
- Better Feed control - Now you can completely turn off Trending while keeping New Discussions to appear in the Feed
- Ads quality is improved and less game install ads. (Subscribe to our VIP to remove ads! :)
- Now it's easier to switch forum account 
- Basic support for Panjo Marketplace
- New Push Alert settings to force all push alerts with alert tones (default is OFF)
- Forum Home page is updated with the new "Home" tab
- "Who's Online" is back!
- Now you can like a post in a chatroom!

- Forum Owner: now you can update the forum logo and cover photo in app - just login as administrator to gain access
- Revised FORUMS tab to show category description as well as ability to show stickies and announcements predominantly
- Push Notifications - advanced options allow you to fine-tune alert sound for different notification type.

Enjoy!

- Forum Owner: now you can update the forum logo and cover photo in app - just login as administrator to gain access
- Revised FORUMS tab to show category description as well as ability to show stickies and announcements predominantly
- Push Notifications - advanced options allow you to fine-tune alert sound for different notification type.

Enjoy!

- Ability to hide stickies
- Ability to show category description in Forums tab
- Bug fixes and performance improvement

- Ability to hide stickies
- Ability to show category description in Forums tab
- Bug fixes and performance improvement

iPad users:
- We added iOS9+ iPad system split screen support so you can use the app at the same time you are using other apps
- We removed the app-level split screen support so you no longer can split the topic and post view on the same screen

Whats new:
- Improved the user experience to make it easier to create new discussion
- Improved Search result and discovery experience to make it easier to find the groups you are looking for

iPad users:
- We added iOS9+ iPad system split screen support so you can use the app at the same time you are using other apps
- We removed the app-level split screen support so you no longer can split the topic and post view on the same screen

Whats new:
- Improved the user experience to make it easier to create new discussion
- Improved Search result and discovery experience to make it easier to find the groups you are looking for

Bug fixes.

(iPad users: the split screen views was removed in earlier version to make room to support native iOS split screen for iPad Pro - but for sure we will get to it to make the iPad full screen experience better!

Bug fixes.

(iPad users: the split screen views was removed in earlier version to make room to support native iOS split screen for iPad Pro - but for sure we will get to it to make the iPad full screen experience better!

- Improve BBCode support in thread view
- Overall performance improvement and bug fixes

Fix crash issue on topic view.
Fix crash issue on topic view.

- Various bug fixes and performance improvement
- On-going GDPR related adjustment

- Various bug fixes and performance improvement
- On-going GDPR related adjustment
- Create your own Tapatalk Groups!

- Fixed UI issue for multitasking on iPad. 
- Refined VIP purchase view. 
- Added monthly VIP promotions. 
- Users can now send VIP awards to post creators.

Introducing Tapatalk version 8!

Fully optimized for iOS12 with tons of performance, usability and user interface enhancement. Try the new Tapatalk app today.

- Fixed UI issue for multitasking on iPad. 
- Refined VIP purchase view. 
- Added monthly VIP promotions. 
- Users can now send VIP awards to post creators.

Introducing Tapatalk version 8!

Fully optimized for iOS12 with tons of performance, usability and user interface enhancement. Try the new Tapatalk app today.

In this version, we've merged the Home and the Groups tab so you can easily access your favorite groups while checking out the latest trending and popular images. Plus:

- Ability to hide posts from the users you previously ignored
- Improved overall searching experience, from groups, to discussions and users.
- Latest and trending photos are now shown right in the feed.

In this version, we've merged the Home and the Groups tab so you can easily access your favorite groups while checking out the latest trending and popular images. Plus:

- Ability to hide posts from the users you previously ignored
- Improved overall searching experience, from groups, to discussions and users.
- Latest and trending photos are now shown right in the feed.

In this update, we focused on improving users' experience in forum level user to user following and communications while diminishing other Tapatalk global social features. You'll find now it's easier to find and follow someone or sending PM to another user within a forum. Plus: 
- Updated Tapatalk ID registration UI
- Updated Forum home log in UI
- Updated Forum logo default image
- Added new Kin tasks and moved the tasks to Feed

In this update, we focused on improving users' experience in forum level user to user following and communications while diminishing other Tapatalk global social features. You'll find now it's easier to find and follow someone or sending PM to another user within a forum. Plus: 
- Updated Tapatalk ID registration UI
- Updated Forum home log in UI
- Updated Forum logo default image
- Added new Kin tasks and moved the tasks to Feed

Improve battery usage.
Fix major bugs.

Improve battery usage.
Fix major bugs.

You'll find more options in this update to reward content creators. At Tapatalk, we believe peer recognition fosters high-quality content. Sending awards to others is the best way to show your appreciation to the content creator and positively reinforce the peer to peer interaction in the online communities. You'll find new "Give Awards" button in many forums in this update. Plus:  
- Improved UI for Tapatalk account sign up and log in. 
- Simplified joining and leaving process for Tapatalk hosted groups. 
- Send Kin reward to others to earn ad-free access to the App. 
- and More

You'll find more options in this update to reward content creators. At Tapatalk, we believe peer recognition fosters high-quality content. Sending awards to others is the best way to show your appreciation to the content creator and positively reinforce the peer to peer interaction in the online communities. You'll find new "Give Awards" button in many forums in this update. Plus:  
- Improved UI for Tapatalk account sign up and log in. 
- Simplified joining and leaving process for Tapatalk hosted groups. 
- Send Kin reward to others to earn ad-free access to the App. 
- and More

Enjoy the following updates: 
- Get easy on the eyes! We have a new streamlined Dark Mode experience! 
- Simplified notification settings. 
- Bug fixes.

Enjoy the following updates: 
- Get easy on the eyes! We have a new streamlined Dark Mode experience! 
- Simplified notification settings. 
- Bug fixes.

Happy summer holidays! We added more perks to your daily forum activity- 
- You'll now be notified on the Tapatalk App if someone sends you Tapatalk Awards in the Tapatalk Group hosted forums.
- You'll be able to select and upload multiple images and files if you are a Tapatalk VIP. 
- Logged-in members can now see recently joined users.

In this update, we focused on the experience improvement for VIP subscribed users: 
1. Lighthouse users will now get 6 months free to sign up for VIP
2. Refined subscription flow for easy signup. 
3. Multi-image upload for VIP users. 
4. Simplified onboarding process. 
5. iOS 13 support. 
6. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

In this update, we focused on the experience improvement for VIP subscribed users: 
1. Lighthouse users will now get 6 months free to sign up for VIP
2. Refined subscription flow for easy signup. 
3. Multi-image upload for VIP users. 
4. Simplified onboarding process. 
5. iOS 13 support. 
6. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Here are the updates we made in 8.6.0
1. You can now @ another user when writing a post. 
2. Improvements in Feed Cards display.
3. Added quick login buttons for returning users. 
4. GIPHY is supported for VIP users. 
5. Download the original image is now supported for VIP users. 
6. Gold Points balance is available in the App for users who are members of Tapatalk Groups
